abstracts.cdata!:
The Third Industrial Credit Project is
            designed to support China Investment Bank's (CIB) short
            term financing plan. CIB, provides investment loans for
            small and medium sized industrial projects needing foreign
            exchange. The objective will be to continue Bank support for
            improved investment efficiency through the import of
            technology and the introduction of improved project design
            and selection methodology. Subborrowers will be some 80
            state and collective enterprises primarily in the eastern
            provinces and municipalities.
